heading: Landing Page
paragraph: Approach to Boostrap, HTML, and CSS technologies, basic cover
explicacion: This project was developed to learn and practice the fundamentals of HTML and CSS. It has a very rudimentary style, colorful but not visually pleasing, marking the first interactions with UX/UI and front-end design topics.

heading: Student Management
explicacion: In this project, simple student management is carried out, using the browser's localStorage. It practices the basics of application design and the use of JavaScript.

heading: Pokemon Battle
explicacion: It is a basic simulation of a Pokemon battle, using a call to the PokeApi. Also, a local API is implemented to manipulate the data obtained from PokeApi, first steps with an express server and NodeJs.

heading: Restaurant
paragraph: Restaurant page using React and Firebase
explicacion: Comprehensive restaurant page with all kinds of basic functions. It displays the menu, allows table reservation, and also has a blog section. The page is created using React.

heading: E-Commerce
paragraph: Sale of futuristic ATVs using PayPal Sandbox, React, Node, and Mongo
explicacion: Page created to sell quad bikes, with a futuristic approach, following the design of various modern e-commerce sites. Technologies such as React, Express, PayPal Sandbox are integrated.
